meanings.definition: A group of hydrocarbons with the formula C5H12.
meanings.sent1: Pentanes are molecules made up of five carbon atoms and twelve hydrogen atoms.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician studied the properties of pentanes for the experiment.
meanings.sent3: When the pentanes gathered for a party, they formed a tight group due to their molecular structure.
meanings.sent4: The pentanes in the mixture danced together, each following the same formula.
meanings.sent5: In the world of pentanes, five carbons and twelve hydrogens always make a perfect match.

meanings.definition: A type of organic compound commonly used as a solvent.
meanings.sent1: The painter chose pentanes as the solvent to clean the brushes.
meanings.sent2: Pentanes are known for their ability to dissolve various substances effectively.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous pentanes played hide and seek with the other chemicals in the lab.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity flowed freely like pentanes, effortlessly blending ideas together.
